attributes.action: Do not close children’s A&E at King George Hospital on 16th November.
attributes.additional_details: King George’s hospital should not close the children’s A&E on 15th November due to covid 19. There aren’t enough hospitals in the area and Queens hospital, who will be taking the back flow, will not be able to manage. Queens hospital children’s A&E department is several hours long, without pandemic and without a spill over from King Georges. King George’s children’s A&E need to remain open so ALL sick children can be treated.
attributes.background: Do not close King Georges Hospitals children’s A&E on November 16th

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise.

The decision to continue or cease providing specific services at an individual hospital site is an operational decision for the local NHS Trust. 

You can contact the relevant Trust via the details provided on their website:
https://www.bhrhospitals.nhs.uk/contact-us/
